thread.title: Afridi Suggests to Make Azhar Ali Captain of Test Team
thread.title_full: Afridi Suggests to Make Azhar Ali Captain of Test Team

author: Ghafoor
title: Afridi Suggests to Make Azhar Ali Captain of Test Team
text:
Cricket , News Â· Tagged: Pakistan , Shahid Khan Afridi 
Pakistan leading all rounder, Shahid Khan Afridi said if Misbah ul Haq gets the retirement from the test cricket then popular test batsman of Pakistan, Azhar Ali is the strong candidates for the captaincy of Pakistan test national cricket team. 
The World cup T20 is scheduled in India next year and the national team has various assignments with it, which can be used to make the performance of the team better. He spent very busy day in Karachi, as he inaugurated a basketball court in a local government high school, then he went to South End Club and he gave various useful tips to the women cricket teams and made different pictures with the players of Bangladesh women cricket team.
